checksum_type.description: Checksum of the repository, currently 'sha1' & 'sha256'are supported

connection.description: Name of <connection> from this pack's configuration that specifies how to connect to a server.

deb_architectures.description: comma separated list of architectures to be synched from deb-archive

deb_components.description: comma separated list of repo components to be synched from deb-archive

deb_releases.description: comma separated list of releases to be synched from deb-archive

docker_tags_whitelist.description: Comma separated list of tags to sync for Container Image repository

docker_upstream_name.description: Name of the upstream docker repository

download_policy.description: download policy for yum repos (either 'immediate','on_demand', or 'background')

gpg_key_id.description: id of the gpg key that will be assigned to the new repository

ignorable_content.description: List of content units to ignore while syncing a yum repository. Must besubset of rpm,drpm,srpm,distribution,erratum

ignore_global_proxy.description: if true, will ignore the globally configured Capsule when syncing

mirror_on_sync.description: true if this repository when synced has to be mirrored from the source andstale rpms removed

ostree_upstream_sync_depth.description: if a custom sync policy is chosen for ostree repositories then a'depth' value must be provided

ostree_upstream_sync_policy.description: policies for syncing upstream ostree repositories

password.description: Optional override of the password in <connection>. (required if <connection> is not specified)

server.description: Optional override of the server in <connection> (required if <connection> is not specified).

ssl_ca_cert_id.description: Idenifier of the SSL CA Cert

ssl_client_cert_id.description: Identifier of the SSL Client Cert

ssl_client_key_id.description: Identifier of the SSL Client Key

unprotected.description: true if this repository can be published via HTTP

upstream_password.description: Password of the upstream repository user used for authentication

upstream_username.description: Username of the upstream repository user used for authentication

username.description: Optional override of the username in <connection> (example: username@domain.tld) (required if <connection> is not specified).

verify_ssl_on_sync.description: if true, Katello will verify the upstream url's SSL certifcates aresigned by a trusted CA
